author: sky.cactus
content: The payload is opaque to 2718, so it can be encoded however the transaction type wants.

author: sky.cactus
content: The payload bytes can be RLP, or SSZ, or UTF8 JSON, etc.

author: sky.cactus
content: Basically 2718 is just saying that the 2718 specification is unopinionated about the encoding of the payload.
